title: VRShivaji Construction marketing website (responsive sections + inquiry form)

requirements.summary: Build a responsive multi-section marketing site with clear navigation to Services and Contact within one click.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing experience includes clear business name “VRShivaji Construction” and a concise value proposition in English.
Site is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Navigation allows users to reach Services and Contact sections within 1 click.

file_operations.description: Create the primary single-page marketing layout with a header navigation (anchor links) that reaches Services and Contact within 1 click, and render the required sections in a responsive structure.

Create a responsive header with desktop and mobile navigation (anchors to sections). Use shadcn-ui navigation primitives as appropriate (e.g., Button) while composing without modifying frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a footer with basic business/placeholder details and quick links to Services and Contact anchors for 1-click access.
Create a reusable Section wrapper (container + spacing + section heading pattern) to ensure consistent responsive spacing and hierarchy across the site.

requirements.summary: Implement Home, Services, Why Choose Us, Projects/Portfolio, About, and Contact sections in English with required content and sample data.
acceptanceCriteria: Home includes hero, service highlights, and clear calls-to-action (e.g., “Request a Quote”, “View Services”).
Services section/page renders at least 6 services with titles and short descriptions.
Projects/Portfolio displays a grid/list of project cards (can use sample data initially).
Contact section/page includes an inquiry form with fields: Name, Phone, Email, Message.

file_operations.description: Add English copy and sample data (value proposition, at least 6 services, differentiators, and portfolio project card data) used by the marketing sections.
Implement the Home hero section with value proposition, calls-to-action (scroll to Services and Contact), and hero media placement.

Implement Services section rendering at least 6 services with titles and short descriptions. Use shadcn-ui Card (composed, not modified) for service tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement Why Choose Us section listing differentiators (quality, timelines, safety, transparency, etc.) with consistent styling and layout.

Implement Projects/Portfolio section with a responsive grid of example project cards from sample data. Use shadcn-ui Card (composed, not modified). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement About section with company overview, mission, and service area placeholders in English.

Implement Contact section containing address/phone/email placeholders plus an inquiry form with fields Name, Phone, Email, Message. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button/Label (composed, not modified). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire all sections into the main page in the required order and ensure each section has stable anchor ids (e.g., services, projects, about, contact) for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add validated contact inquiry submission that calls the backend canister and shows loading/success/error UI states.
acceptanceCriteria: Client-side validation blocks submission when Name, Email (or Phone), and Message are empty.
On submit, the frontend calls a backend method to store the inquiry.
UI shows a loading state during submission and a clear success message when stored.
UI shows a clear error message if the backend call fails.

file_operations.description: Create a React Query mutation hook that uses the existing actor wiring (useActor) to call the backend capability submitInquiry, and exposes loading/success/error state for the contact form.

Add client-side validation (require Name + Message + (Email or Phone)); on submit call useSubmitInquiry and show loading UI and clear success/error messages. Use shadcn-ui form controls and feedback components (e.g., Button, Alert) via composition without modifying frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add shared validation helpers for the inquiry form (required field checks and user-friendly English error messages) to keep UI logic consistent and testable.

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent professional construction theme (charcoal/sand/orange accents) with consistent typography and spacing across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme uses a consistent palette (e.g., charcoal/graphite, warm sand, and safety orange accents) and consistent typography scale.
Buttons, cards, headings, and section spacing feel consistent across all pages/sections.
No default-template look: hero, sections, and cards have deliberate styling and hierarchy.

file_operations.description: Create global styles and Tailwind base layers with a charcoal/sand/orange design system via CSS variables (driving shadcn-ui theme tokens) and consistent typography/spacing defaults.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (if needed) to support the construction palette and typographic scale (without introducing blue/purple defaults) while keeping usage consistent across sections.
Ensure the shared Section wrapper enforces consistent vertical rhythm, headings hierarchy, and responsive spacing to avoid a default-template look.

requirements.summary: Add generated logo and hero image assets and wire them into header and hero section with responsive behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Header displays the logo with the text “VRShivaji Construction”.
Home hero section displays the hero image with proper responsive behavior (no distortion, reasonable cropping).

file_operations.description: Add the generated construction wordmark logo asset at the exact required path for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated wide hero banner asset at the exact required path for direct frontend referencing.
Wire the logo image (frontend/public/assets/generated/vrshivaji-logo.dim_512x512.png) into the header alongside the text “VRShivaji Construction”, ensuring responsive sizing and alignment.
Wire the hero image (frontend/public/assets/generated/construction-hero.dim_1600x900.png) into the Home hero with responsive layout behavior (no distortion; reasonable cropping via layout choices).
